detaileddescription.para: CONFIGURATION MACROS OTHER MACROS (do not change)

memberdef.name: MaxBezier
memberdef.initializer: 32 /* The maximum number of stacked Bezier curves. */

memberdef.name: AlignProfileSize
memberdef.initializer: ( ( sizeof ( TProfile ) + sizeof ( Alignment ) - 1 ) / sizeof ( Long ) )

memberdef.name: SWAP_
memberdef.initializer: do \ { \ Long swap = x; \ \ \ x = y; \ y = swap; \ } while ( 0 )
